emcc modules.c -o interface.html -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=['_addFlight','_loadFlightsFromFile','_getAllFlightsJSON','_register_user','_login','_getOneWayFlightsJSON','_updateFlight','_deleteFlight','_addPassenger','_loadPassengers','_createInitialAdmins','_malloc','_free','_unlink'] -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=['ccall','cwrap','setValue'] -s FORCE_FILESYSTEM=1  -lidbfs.js
